roleset.name: analyse or identify proteins via antigen-antibody specific reactions

role.descr: target of immunoblotting, antigens/proteins checked for

example.name: Arg0
example.text: In our characterization of the DOR antisera, we immunoblotted protein extracted from NG108-15 cells and rat spinal cord.
example.arg: protein extracted from NG108-15 cells and rat spinal cord

example.name: Arg3
example.text: Bound proteins were resolved by SDS-PAGE and immunoblotted with anti-BCL6 and anti-c-Rel antibodies.

example.name: Arg2
example.text: TRUSS was immunoprecipitated and immunoblotted from HeLa cells that stably expressed Flag-TRUSS.
example.arg: HeLa cells that stably expressed Flag-TRUSS
